data.enText: a time when a particular situation makes it possible to do or achieve sth

data.chText: 你们最后将有机会提问任何问题。
data.enText: You'll have the opportunity to ask any questions at the end.

data.chText: 没有机会进行深入讨论了。
data.enText: There was no opportunity for further discussion.

data.chText: 至少要给他机会解释一下发生了什么事。
data.enText: At least give him the opportunity of explaining what happened.

data.chText: 本公司提倡男女机会均等。
data.enText: Our company promotes equal opportunities for women (= women are given the same jobs, pay, etc. as men) .

data.chText: 职业发展 / 就业 / 工作机会
我谨借此机会感谢同事的支持。
data.enText: I'd like to take this opportunity to thank my colleagues for their support.

data.chText: 他动不动就对我粗鲁无礼。
data.enText: He is rude to me at every opportunity (= whenever possible) .

data.chText: 他们打算尽早关闭学校。
data.enText: They intend to close the school at the earliest opportunity (= as soon as possible) .
a window of opportunity (= a period of time when the circumstances are right for doing sth)

ex.enText: They had no opportunity/chance to escape.

ex.chText: 他获得了访问巴黎的机会。
ex.enText: He has got the opportunity/chance to visit Paris.

ex.chText: 对去年的毕业生而言，就业机会要多一些。
ex.enText: There were more opportunities for graduates last year.

synonyms.bx: 指能够做某事或容易做成某事的机会，作此义解时常可与 chance 换用；也可指得到工作或提升的机会。

ex.chText: 这是他唯一的逃脱机会。
ex.enText: It was his only chance of escape.

ex.chText: 我从不错过任何踢足球的机会。
ex.enText: I never miss a chance to play football.

ex.chText: 他将是下周竞选的候选人，这是他成功的大好机会。
ex.enText: He will be a candidate in next week's election, and this is his big chance.

synonyms.bx: 指做想做之事的适当时机，侧重指偶然或意外的机会。

ex.chText: 这是个举国欢庆的时刻。
ex.enText: This is an occasion for the whole country to celebrate.

ex.chText: 这是两位总统表达友谊的时机。
ex.enText: It was the occasion for expressing friendship by the two presidents.

synonyms.bx: 指合适的机会或有利的时机，通常用单数，常后接介词 for。

ex.chText: 现在正是我们搬到纽约去的好时机。
ex.enText: Now is the right time for us to move to New York.

ex.chText: 如果有时间我会去拜访她。
ex.enText: I'll visit her if I have time.

ex.chText: 现在不是换工作的时候。
ex.enText: This is no time to switch jobs.

synonyms.bx: 指能够用来做某事的一段时间，多用于口语。

tr: a possibility due to a favorable combination of circumstances
example: the holiday gave us the opportunity to visit Washington

value.def: An opportunity is a situation in which it is possible for you to do something that you want to do.

example.ex: I had an opportunity to go to New York and study...
example.tran: 我曾经有一个去纽约学习的机会。

example.ex: The best reason for a trip to London is the super opportunity for shopping...
example.tran: 绝佳的购物机会是前往伦敦的最好理由。

example.ex: I want to see more opportunities for young people.
example.tran: 我希望年轻人能有更多机会。

value.boxu_usage: Be careful with the spelling of this word.

trans: 抓住机遇；抓住机会；把握机会
机会成本；更替成本；取舍成本
抓住机会；利用这个机会
外企工作机会；工作机会；就业机会
一有机会；一有机会就；趁早；此词条
表现机会；应用所学技能的机会；执行机会；机会工作
为名人拍照的时机；(为宣传)拍照名人的时间
平等就业机会；同等就业机会；平等雇用机会；公平就业机会；就业机会平等
